value.car: Car/motorbike: Free parking on the entire Klosterweg

catering.title: Catering
catering.value: Food and drink will be supplied! There will be barbecue food (vegan/vegetarian/meat), salads, cakes, alcoholic and non-alcoholic cocktails and draught beer.

0.title: What can I bring along?
0.value: You are very welcome to bring food. Barbecues, salads and cakes are very welcome. Everything is available in terms of drinks. If you have an interesting game or something similar, you are also welcome to bring it along!

1.title: What can I gift you?
1.value: Your presence is the greatest gift! If you still want to give a gift, I would be happy about a donation for the drinks and food. Of course, I am still happy to receive creative gifts :D

2.title: Is it possible to stay overnight?
2.value: Unfortunately, there are only very limited places to sleep and only for people outside Karlsruhe. If you need a place to sleep, please let me know when you register and join the Bettbörse.

3.title: Can I offer a bed for the night?
3.value: As long as you live within Karlsruhe, this is possible. Please indicate this when you register and join the Bettbörse.

4.title: Is there a place where you can plan to travel together by car?
4.value: Yes, there is a group for this where you can exchange ideas: Carpooling

5.title: How does the team battle work?
5.value: Each guest receives a team membership (red/blue) and 5 tokens when registering. These can be bet for various games. The more tokens a team has in proportion to the opposing team at the end, the more the team wins from the prize.

6.title: Is there vegatarian food and what about allergens?
6.value: Vegetarian food is planned alongside meat dishes. There will also be vegan options. Please let me know when you register if you have a vegan lifestyle so that we can plan better. If you have any intolerances or allergies, please let me know - then I can tell you what you can eat without hesitation.

7.title: Will I have fun?
7.value: YES! You will have the best night of your life! Whether old or young, big or small, nerdy or party, you will have fun!

value.8: 01:00am - Resolution of the team fight + speech

detail.subtitle: Everything you need to know about the Bday

theme.title: Theme
theme.value: There is a voluntary motto. If you wish, you can come as something that begins with the same letter as your first name or surname.

detail.title: Details

community.content: Don't want to miss anything? You need a ride or a place to sleep? You want exclusive content and pictures from Bday? Then join the Bday WhatsApp community!

cookies.body: This website does not use any analytics tools or tracking of any kind. Only functional cookies are used. These are small text files stored by your web browser on your device. They help retain certain settings—such as language or display preferences—and recognize you when you return. This ensures that logged-in sessions remain active, so you don’t have to log in every time you visit. Cookies remain on your device for up to one year unless you delete them manually. Most modern web browsers allow you to monitor, limit, or block the use of cookies. Many can also be configured to automatically delete cookies when the browser is closed. Please note that disabling cookies may limit the functionality of this website.
cookies.title: Analytics/Cookies/External Resources etc.?

data.body: When simply visiting this website, only the cookies listed below are collected. These cookies are not stored on the server, but solely on your device. The website contains buttons labeled “By clicking, you confirm the privacy policy.” By clicking one of these buttons, the data you entered on the website is transmitted to the server and stored there. Further details on this process can be found in the following section. Access to this data is limited exclusively to the website operator named in the legal notice (imprint). The data is used solely for the purpose of responding to your inquiry and will not be shared with third parties without your explicit consent. Collecting this data is necessary for the planning of the event. All submitted data will be permanently deleted no later than one week after the event has taken place.
data.title: What data is collected by this website?

rights.body: According to DSGVO and BDSG, you can request information, updating, blocking or deletion of all your data at any time. Your contact person for this is the above-mentioned operator of this website. In addition, I am obliged to remind you of your right to object to this consent at any time and, if necessary, to complain to a supervisory authority about me.
rights.title: What are my rights?
